body_html:
Something like export LD_PRELOAD="/usr/lib/libtcmalloc_and_profiler.so.4" export CPUPROFILE="cpu-profile" python lm_benchmark_grpc.py --num_gpus=1 export exe=`which python` google-pprof --pdf $exe $CPUPROFILE > profiling_output.pdf
…

body_text:
Something like

export LD_PRELOAD="/usr/lib/libtcmalloc_and_profiler.so.4"
export CPUPROFILE="cpu-profile"
python lm_benchmark_grpc.py --num_gpus=1

export exe=`which python`
google-pprof --pdf $exe $CPUPROFILE > profiling_output.pdf

body:
Something like

export LD_PRELOAD="/usr/lib/libtcmalloc_and_profiler.so.4"
export CPUPROFILE="cpu-profile"
python lm_benchmark_grpc.py --num_gpus=1

export exe=`which python`
google-pprof --pdf $exe $CPUPROFILE > profiling_output.pdf


On Tue, Jan 10, 2017 at 6:59 PM, Nick Shah <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> Hey @yaroslavvb <https://github.com/yaroslavvb> thanks for your response.
> I will use tcmalloc and try to diagnose what exactly is going on. Do you
> recommend just running it like this?
>
> LD_PRELOAD=/usr/lib/libtcmalloc.so.4 HEAPPROFILE=/tmp/profile python
> timestep_network.py
>
> —
